  • Processor: AMD FX Series or Intel Core i3 Series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 2.0, Ubuntu 16.04 or similar Linux distribution, 64-bit kernel
  • Processor: AMD FX Series or Intel Core i3 Series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD5570 or NVIDIA GT440 with 1GB of VRAM (OpenGL 4.2 compliant)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: PulseAudio/ALSA Compatible Soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Intel graphics are not supported. Mesa 17.0.2 or later recommended for AMD GPUs. nvidia-375 series driver recommended for Nvidia GPUs. Wayland is currently unsupported.

Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 or higher, SteamOS+
  • Processor: 1.5 GhZ (w/ SSE2 instruction set support)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 Support (generally anything newer than 2004)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: K/B can be used as an input for one player. At least one additional Microsoft Xbox 360 controller required (or direct input device equivalent). Looks best in 1080P (1920x1080) or 720P (1280x720).
